## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09070](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09070)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OPS</u>
- **Gene Name:** OCTOPUS
- **Description:**   LOW protein: UPF0503-like protein, putative (DUF740);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G09070.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09070.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [opl2-1/ops-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Slow growth, dwarf stature, short roots. Differentiation of protophloem and metaphloem is delayed. Abnormal phloem development leads to defects in phloem transport.
